segments.text: Yes . Where would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Central Park , please , but can you make a stop at Union Square ? I wanna pick up my friend there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long do you think it will take to get to Union Square .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . That depends on traffic , you know . It's pretty heavy this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you make it in 15 mins . I am already 10 mins late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll try . Where exactly is your friend waiting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On the 14th Street side . Oh , we are already at the 16th Street . You are fast . Can you make a left at the next corner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he is around here . Can you slow down ? Ah , there he is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1
